about_the_game: Psssst! You wanna hear some naughty music? Take a peep at the Jackbox Naughty Pack soundtrack! 63 tracks of forbidden aural pleasures that'll get you up on your feet and hot under your collar. Songs so spicy, you won't have to be FAKIN' IT ALL NIGHT LONG. But LET ME FINISH... uh... DIRTY DRAWFUL! Give these songs a spin and then check out the games on STEAM! [Boing sound effect!]

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages. It contains General Mature Content, and may include Nudity or Sexual Content.
